longBusinessSummary.0: IDFC Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the investment activities in India. The company operates through Financing and Others segments. It is also involved in the asset management, fastag, cash management, wealth management, wholesale loans, retail loans, and insurance and mutual fund distribution. The company was formerly known as Infrastructure Development Finance Company Limited and changed its name to IDFC Limited in July 2012. IDFC Limited was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Mumbai, India.
